title: Welcome to my blog!
excerpt: This is the first post on my new blog. I'm excited to share my thoughts and projects here.
content:
Welcome!

I finally decided to start a blog. I wanted something simple, fast, and easy to maintain. This blog is built with Next.js, and everything is driven by a single JSON file.

Stay tuned for more updates on AI, data science, and web development!

title: Pivoting to Next.js for a Better Dev Experience
excerpt: Why I switched from pure HTML to Next.js mid-development.
content:
The Pivot

While plain HTML is great, it can be tricky to test locally due to CORS security policies on the file:// protocol. Next.js gives me a powerful dev server and makes routing a breeze.

Plus, it's perfect for Vercel!
